useWorkerState()

Overview

A hook that acts similar to Reacts useState but computes in a seperate thread, returns a state, and cleans itself up on un-mount.

Import

Interface

Usage

Demo

Caution

If you use a large number it can take quite a while. 😅 Use as your own risk.
